channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis can?t get Grizzly?s new animal training method to work on a wilful Gnasher. However, when they realise that Gnasher can use the method to get humans to obey him instead, they exploit this new power to the max.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse must fight his own urge to be awesome to stop the world turning into a gigantic intergalactic tourist attraction. Attempting to prove his theory that what the world always needs is a hero, Danger Mouse fights off what appears to be an alien invasion of Earth - but his inflated ego soon becomes the real intergalactic threat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A trainee witch asks the Ninjas to find her a cat so she can pass her magic exam. However, getting the easily frightened kitten to participate proves to be a challenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. On a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. But Shaun's insatiable curiosity often leads him into the unlikeliest adventures. When the Farmer takes Timmy's favourite sheep dolly, the little lamb won't stop crying. So Shaun rallies the flock to get it back from Pidsley, the farm cat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are fighting over a crown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl hears that Lila secretly thinks she is great and tries to get her to admit it. But how far does she have to go for Lila to declare Girl?s greatness.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The tired heroes must quest to find out and stop whatever is making the loud wailing noise that has kept the residents of the forest up all night.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. When Ms O leaves to conduct a super-secret mission, the agents compete to figure out who is in charge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. Otis and Olympia are stuck with a new robot partner.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: It?s time to go head-to-head in Super Smash Bros! Guided by pro gamer Slogo, the teams face off in an epic showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Jett tries to find her place in A-Troupe but is feeling left out. Ethan reminisces about his time in Paris, while Adele looks to a new opportunity abroad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall meets the snappiest shark in our seas. The lemon shark scours the sandy seabed for food, but how does it get a good grip on hidden prey? Steve heads to the Bahamas in the Caribbean to dive with these feisty sharks. He heads down on his dive with a time slice rig to film the lemon shark's bite in three dimensions before heading into his shark lab to analyse it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: The flock try to see off a pair of fly-tippers who have been filling the pond with rubbish.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's over-reliance on gadgets prompts Colonel K to send his top agent on a tech-free nature retreat. Unbeknownst to Danger Mouse, Greenback has the same plans for his daughter, Delilah, whose social media obsession has also spiralled out of control. Back at HQ Penfold is tasked with protecting the entire world from the threat of super-villainy. Stripped off his gadgets, DM struggles to adapt to life in the wilderness and, when a talking pine cone called Conni begins to offer him survival tips, he begins to question his own sanity. Soon enough, Delilah catches wind of DM's presence and she plots to destroy him as a means of getting back into her Dad's good books.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Fed up with Dennis pulling the wool over Mrs Creecher's eyes, Walter orchestrates a robot to take over Class 3C - with disastrous results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The Girls and the Boys compete to get to the top of Bear Mountain, using very different styles of camping. But when the legendary bear appears, they have to team up to survive.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into a race.

channel.desc: The Lemmings and Grizzy clash over a choco granita recipe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Omar finds himself stuck in a mysterious void.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Watch the mud (and food) fly as sheep take on pigs in the fight to end all fights.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Helsing tasks the gang with finding a magical genie lamp, thinking that they won't give it a polish. Now, Charlie is famous, Pierce is a CEO and Que has legs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: The winning teams return to the arena to take on Mario Kart in the Grand Final. Who will win the competition and claim the Game on Grandparents trophy and GOAT title.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Pete tries to juggle both the Brawl and regionals, but it may be too much. Ethan discovers a huge secret within A-Troupe, and Olive is suspicious of Ariana and Grace?s friendship.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Octonauts embark on the biggest adventure ever! The crew is caught off guard by a volcanic eruption in the Pacific, but this single emergency soon turns into a global disaster when eruptions are triggered all across the Ring of Fire ? a chain of hundreds of land and undersea volcanoes encircling the Pacific Ocean. As the Octonauts scramble to rise to the challenge of their multipronged rescue mission, Tweak has one last trick up her sleeve: the Gup-Z ? a giant, untested new mecha Gup that will take the whole crew to operate.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings turn into crab rescuers, but soon the house is full of them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Bionic ends up dressed as a rabbit when Nitro pranks him at a fake photoshoot, and the rest of the Gladiators have fun behind the scenes as they prank the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: Pickle enters the local dog show with her pet, Swumpy the warthoffle. When Roland cheats, Pickle?s magic makes Mr Ludcomb behave like a dog. In the chaos, someone steals the trophy..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Jo causes chaos when she tells Celeste?s mother that Celeste doesn?t want to return home. Meanwhile, Nancy, June and Felicity are excited to discover that Fred knows about the time capsule.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Coach Byrne?s controversial new tactics throw the team into disarray, rousing Bobby's suspicions. Is he really trying to improve them, or is there something more sinister going on.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus - an animal so large that even its poo was deadly! But if you thought that was the biggest ever dinosaur, then think again. With stunning graphics and epic stunts, featuring a piano smash, a fire hose hose-down and the most powerful heart in the animal kingdom, Steve crowns his king of all beasts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Rio has lost his air guitar and his confidence. The band travel through space to take him home to Planet Rock to see the Godfather of Rock, who will help him get them back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe become busy bees for a gunge-fuelled challenge ? who will collect the most nectar and win Callum?s ultimate respect.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: Paani seeks refuge in a grouse's burrow during a snowstorm but then gets trapped.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Big Lizard isn't happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises that's exactly what he needs to do. He's shedding his skin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold takes a trip inside Danger Mouse's body to save him from a deadly aversion to his own heroism.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: It's the famous Beanotown Freewheeler Derby! During practice, the gang realize Walter's go-kart is especially speedy. Worried that Walter will beat his record, Dennis creates a lighter, faster kart but loses control and injures himself. It is up to Rubi's wheelchair know-how and Dennis' super-speedy karting skills to win the race.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Gnome Crystal Mine has ground to a halt, leaving the forest with no crystals, no power supply and melting ice lollies! The heroes are tasked with a quest to find out what has happened and to fix it. It turns out that a slimy beast named Smarg has made the mine her home. But with Hoofius?s fear of gunk getting the better of him, evicting the slippery Smarg is not going to be easy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: My Life
channel.desc: The world is not always built for kids like 13-year-old Eleanor - who has a visual impairment - but she wants to change that. Follow her trailblazing challenge to audio describe a live show at the National Theatre ? usually done by sighted people. While juggling her own journey to gain independence, Eleanor must prove to herself and her parents that she is ready to take her next big steps.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: A visit to the Wild Area turns into a curry-making adventure for the Rising Volt Tacklers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Proteus, leader of the mysterious Guardians, traps the Aronnax in a magnetic field and kidnaps Ant, believing he is the key to finding Lemuria. Ant thinks Proteus is crazy. He tries to escape to save his family.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis is mega-excited to trial a pair of hi-tech Smarty Pants - underpants with all the capabilities of a smartphone. However, whenever he and the gang test the pants, Walter is always one step ahead of them.

channel.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders. He meets the armoured tank that is Nodosaurus, tests whether an Iguanodon really has what it takes to beat a T rex and thanks to some mega-engineering, unleashes an Ankylosaurus tail-swinging robot that goes on the rampage and then some.

channel.desc: The danger agents are at Squawk's super-secret Wild West testing facility, home to a society of Penbots, robots who have a rather familiar face. But Tenfold malfunctions and transforms into the ruthless Meanfold, determined to destroy anyone who is not quite perfect.

channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is acting very strangely indeed. He refuses to stamp any of Admin Bunny?s documents, keeps getting distracted by butterflies, and seems oddly happy! Now they must quest to find out where the real Friendlyface is and get him back before the forest descends into total chaos.
